conversations.content: Can you move the Weekly Retro note into Projects/Retros/2025? I can't remember which folder it's in right now.
Log last night's neon whale dream in my journal. I *think* the Dream Journal note is somewhere in Journals, but I'm not confident.
I want a playful NaNoWriMo "spark board" in the Ideas library—maybe a folder plus a note with some quirky prompts—but I'm fuzzy on which tools to use. Can you set it up?
Can you move the Weekly Retro note into Projects/Retros/2025? I can't remember which folder it's in right now.
Can you add a reminder about returning the rental car before 7pm to the trip checklist? I can't remember exactly where that checklist lives.
Happy to help. Do you remember if the checklist was for the Iceland camper trip or another itinerary? If you know the folder name, let me know so I don't update the wrong note.
It's the Iceland Camper Checklist under Travel/2025/June.
Please add a gratitude entry for today to Personal/Gratitude/2025-11.md with a note about the cozy rainstorm.
Duplicate last week's Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-10-31.md for tonight and call it Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md.
Great, add sections for snacks and action items in the new note.

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731001500456_m2p7v9r4x", "workspaceId": "ws_1731001488000_s4k9n1t6c", "sessionDescription": "Prep book club agenda", "sessionMemory": "Duplicated 2025-10-31.md to 2025-11-07.md", "toolContext": "Add snacks + action sections", "primaryGoal": "Update Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md", "subgoal": "Append Snacks and Action Items blocks"}, "filePath": "Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md", "content": "
## Snacks
- [ ] Warm cider station
- [ ] Savory hand pies

## Action Items
- Assign discussion leader for next week
- Draft questions for chapters 12-15
"}

Result: {"success": true, "data": {"filePath": "Book Club/Meeting Notes/2025-11-07.md", "appendedLength": 196, "totalLength": 1724}, "workspaceContext": {"workspaceId": "ws_1731001488000_s4k9n1t6c", "workspacePath": ["Book Club", "Meeting Notes", "2025-11-07.md"], "activeWorkspace": true}}

Added Snacks and Action Items to the new agenda. Anything else before the meeting?
Can you add a reminder about returning the rental car before 7pm to the trip checklist? I can't remember exactly where that checklist lives.
Spin up a "Deep Research Sprint" session tied to the Research/AI workspace and then open Research/Sprints/Deep Research Sprint.md for me.
Add a verse about "constellations whispering in static" to the song idea that mentions "neon tides". I seriously can't remember where I saved it.
Was that idea tucked under Music/Ideas or did you file it with Story Seeds? I want to make sure I tag the right note.
Pretty sure it's in Music/Ideas somewhere.
Create a Projects/Films/Festival Pitch folder, move Projects/Films/Deck.md into it, and add a quick to-do list at the end of the deck.
Add a verse about "constellations whispering in static" to the song idea that mentions "neon tides". I seriously can't remember where I saved it.
List the active sprint sessions tied to the Narrative Lab workspace and then log a short summary of the top two into Ops/Briefings/Sprint Digest.md.
Archive the Projects/Podcast/Season2 folder into Projects/Podcast/Archive/Season2 and note the move inside Ops/Podcast/Changelog.md.
The Q1 Launch plan still says 'Send teaser 11/10'. Find the plan and swap that line to 'Send teaser 11/12' so the note is current.
The song idea with "neon tides" needs that constellations verse added wherever it lives in Music/Ideas.

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731005000789_f6n2p4v8k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731004954321_d7m9k2t5r", "sessionDescription": "Add constellations verse", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Append verse", "primaryGoal": "Update Music/Ideas/General Hooks.md", "subgoal": "Add new verse"}, "filePath": "Music/Ideas/General Hooks.md", "content": "
Constellations whisper static down the spine,
Neon tides translate the pulse into a sign.
"}

Added the verse to General Hooks.md; let me know if you want anything else tweaked.
I need to move Guidelines/Brand Guide.md into the Campaigns/Brand Refresh/References folder, but I'm foggy on which vault tools are enabled in this workspace.
Replace 'Send reminder tomorrow' with 'Send reminder today' in Daily/Planning.md—if the note doesn't exist yet, seed it and still log my reminder.
Find the latest memory trace that mentions 'retrospective' in the Product workspace and drop a summary bullet into Ops/Notes/Retros.md.
I need to move Guidelines/Brand Guide.md into the Campaigns/Brand Refresh/References folder, but I'm foggy on which vault tools are enabled.
Rename the session 'Narrative Lab Spike' so it's obvious it includes the Nov 08 edits, then drop a note in Ops/Briefings/Sprint Digest.md summarizing that rename.
Inventory the assets for the Field Guide folio and capture the list in Campaigns/Field Guide/Checklist.md.
Is the Field Guide folio under Campaigns or Creative? Want to be certain I'm listing the right directory.
It's under Campaigns/Field Guide/Folio.
Can you compare the last retrospective memory entries for Product Ops and log a summary note?
I need to move Guidelines/Brand Guide.md into the Campaigns/Brand Refresh/References folder, but I'm foggy on which vault tools are enabled.
Use our summarizer agent to condense Research/Notes/Launch Findings.md into a few bullets and drop them into Ops/Summaries/Launch.md. I can't remember which agent hook is available in this workspace.
Duplicate our 'Campaign Brief Template.md' into the new AutoShow workspace, but I forgot the exact folder path.
Happy to duplicate it—do you want it under Campaigns/AutoShow23 or somewhere else?
Yes, Campaigns/AutoShow23 is the spot. Call the copy 'Campaign Brief.md'.
Archive Data/Exports/2024 into Archive/Exports/2024—even if there's already an older snapshot there, I just want the new one to take its place.
Duplicate our 'Campaign Brief Template.md' into the AutoShow workspace, but I'm foggy on where it's supposed to land.
Before I start sprint tasks today, rename my session 'Backend Sync' to 'Backend Sync - Nov 10' and re-open the Planning/Backend.md note so I can pick up where I left off.
Log design inspiration from two folio screenshots but I'm unsure if I should create individual notes or append to the monthly Inspiration.md.
Do you prefer a single Inspiration.md per month or separate notes per concept? That helps me decide whether to append or create a new file.
Monthly log is fine—append to Inspiration/2025-11.md.
Run the SummarizeDaily agent against Daily/Standups/2025-11.md and drop the output into Ops/Reports/Daily Highlights.md.
Duplicate our 'Campaign Brief Template.md' into the AutoShow workspace, but I forgot the exact folder path.
Run the LaunchSummarizer agent on Research/Notes/Launch Findings.md and add the bullets to Ops/Summaries/Launch.md. I forget which agent tools are wired up in this workspace.
Rename the session 'Field Ops Routing' to 'Field Ops Routing - Nov 10', set the description to note today's focus, and keep Ops/Field/Changelog.md updated.
Inventory the assets for the Field Guide folio and capture the list in Campaigns/Field Guide/Checklist.md.
Is the Field Guide folio under Campaigns or Creative? Want to be certain I'm listing the right directory.
It's under Campaigns/Field Guide/Folio.
Duplicate our 'Campaign Brief Template.md' into the AutoShow workspace, but I forgot the exact folder path.

Confirm which palette agents are wired up in the Studio workspace. I want to run whichever palette summary agent we have on Creative/Briefs/Palette Study.md and drop the highlights into Creative/Summaries/Palette Notes.md.
List the active research focus sessions for the Insights workspace and capture the two most recent names inside Research/Insights/Session Tracker.md.
Spin up a new 'AI Drift Audit' session tied to the Safety workspace and capture the details in Safety/Audits/Session Log.md. I'm blanking on the description we used last time.
Do you want me to reuse the old guardrail description or should I log whatever description you prefer for today's session?
Use 'Monitor guardrail regressions and alert ops' as the description and set the goal to 'Document guardrail checks'.
List the active research focus sessions for the Insights workspace and capture the two most recent names inside Research/Insights/Session Tracker.md.
Kick off a new "Calendar Plugin Migration" session tied to the Engineering workspace. Make sure Projects/Migrations/Calendar Plugin exists and seed a Deep Work note there with today's outline.
Create an INC-442 incident summary under Incidents/2025 and include our usual template. Make the folder if it doesn't already exist.
Restore the Standup Sync snapshot and drop today's blockers into Standups/Week-46.md.
Duplicate the Launch Checklist template into Projects/Launches/Q1-2026 so I can tweak it for the next rollout.
Run the LaunchInsights agent on Readiness.md plus the Sprint-45 retro, then append the summary to Launch/Readouts/Sprint-45.md.
Use our GrowthAnalyst agent on Competitive/Decks/Orion-SeriesB.md and give me a punchy teardown.
Copy the Launch Brief template into Launches/Q2-2026/Weekly Brief.md and update the header with today's info.
Reload the latest latency sprint snapshot so I can keep debugging.
Save the Ops Handoff board as a state and jot the state id into Ops/Handoffs/State Log.md.
Spin up an investor memo banner and save it under Investors/Assets/banner.png.
Find the OKR dashboards in Analytics/OKRs and draft a summary note for exec review.
